thread.title: Drillsearch CEO Brad Lingo leaves company
thread.title_full: Drillsearch CEO Brad Lingo leaves company

title: Drillsearch CEO Brad Lingo leaves company
text:
Fri, Jul 3, 2015, 9:01 AM AEST - Australia Markets open in 59 mins. Drillsearch CEO Brad Lingo leaves company AAP – 11 minutes ago Print 
Drillsearch Energy chief executive Brad Lingo will leave the company immediately, after more than six years in the job. 
In a statement, Drillsearch on Friday said Mr Lingo was leaving "by mutual agreement" and that the oil and gas company's board of directors had decided new leadership was needed to take the business into its next phase of growth. 
Chief operating officer Walter Simpson will become acting CEO while the company searches for a permanent replacement. @y7finance on Twitter, become a fan on Facebook AAP
